name: SuSquaresUnderlay
description: Personalize your Su Squares that are unpersonalized on the main contract.

eventDecorators.name: PersonalizedUnderlay
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when collateral value to loan rate is changed.

functionDecorators.name: personalizeSquareUnderlay
functionDecorators.description: Update the contents of your Square on the underlay.

parameterDecorators.name: squareId
parameterDecorators.description: Your Square number, the top-left is 1, to its right is 2, ..., top-right is 100 and then 101 is below 1... the last one at bottom-right is 10000.

parameterDecorators.name: rgbData
parameterDecorators.description: A 10x10 image for your square, in 8-bit RGB words ordered like the squares are ordered. See Imagemagick's command: convert -size 10x10 -depth 8 in.rgb out.png.

parameterDecorators.name: title
parameterDecorators.description: A description of your square (max 64 bytes UTF-8).

parameterDecorators.name: href
parameterDecorators.description: A hyperlink for your square (max 96 bytes).

functionDecorators.name: personalizeSquareUnderlayBatch
functionDecorators.description: Update the contents of Square on the underlay.

parameterDecorators.name: personalizations
parameterDecorators.description: Each one is a the personalization for a single Square.
